amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part F of House Report 116-200 to require the Department of Commerce to complete an economic impact study and assessment of potential damage related to offshore oil drilling, including tourism, commercial fishing, recreational fishing, boating, transportation, and other waterfront-related and coastal-related business.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Rouda.
